s.text: On Serbian television, President Clinton has been referred to as Bill Hitler, Adolf Clinton, and FŸhrer.
This is a list of terms used to refer to the NATO alliance and its members, by order of the Serbian Information Ministry, reports Steven Erlanger in the New York Times .
-- New York's Mayor Giuliani on imaginary criticism of his plan to give police officers wallet-sized cards listing tips on interacting with the public.
-- New York's Mayor Giuliani on imaginary criticism of his plan to give police officers wallet-sized cards listing tips on interacting with the public.
-- Stefania Caruso on the homeless cats of San Clemente, a small island near Venice, Italy.
